verses.verse: וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> And Moses וַיְדַבֵּ֛ר <WH1696> and spake אֶת־ <WH853> הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these אֶל־ <WH413> to כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> unto all Israel

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about בֶּן־ <WH1121> old מֵאָה֩ <WH3967> unto them I [am] an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֨ים <WH6242> and twenty שָׁנָ֤ה <WH8141> years אָנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> this day לֹא־ <WH3808> I am no אוּכַ֥ל <WH3201> I can ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer לָצֵ֣את <WH3318> no more go out וְלָב֑וֹא <WH935> and come in וַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> also the LORD אָמַ֣ר <WH559> hath said אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about לֹ֥א <WH3808> I am no תַעֲבֹ֖ר <WH5674> unto me Thou shalt not go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֥ן <WH3383> this Jordan הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> The LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> who עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> he will go over לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before הֽוּא־ <WH1931> He יַשְׁמִ֞יד <WH8045> thee [and] he will destroy אֶת־ <WH853> הַגּוֹיִ֥ם <WH1471> these nations הָאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> these מִלְּפָנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> from before וִֽירִשְׁתָּ֑ם <WH3423> thee and thou shalt possess יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> them [and] Joshua ה֚וּא <WH1931> who עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> he shall go over לְפָנֶ֔יךָ <WH6440> before כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> thee as the LORD

וְעָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> shall do יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לָהֶ֔ם כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> when עָשָׂ֗ה <WH6213> unto them as he did לְסִיח֥וֹן <WH5511> to Sihon וּלְע֛וֹג <WH5747> and to Og מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites וּלְאַרְצָ֑ם <WH776> and unto the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when הִשְׁמִ֖יד <WH8045> of them whom he destroyed אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וּנְתָנָ֥ם <WH5414> shall give them up יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD לִפְנֵיכֶ֑ם <WH6440> before your face וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֣ם <WH6213> that ye may do לָהֶ֔ם כְּכָל־ <WH3605> to all הַמִּצְוָ֔ה <WH4687> unto them according unto all the commandments אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> which I have commanded אֶתְכֶֽם׃ <WH853>

חִזְק֣וּ <WH2388> Be strong וְאִמְצ֔וּ <WH553> and of a good courage אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> fear וְאַל־ <WH408> not תַּעַרְצ֖וּ <WH6206> not nor be afraid מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> of them כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> thy God ה֚וּא <WH1931> who הַהֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> he [it is] that doth go עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> He will not יַרְפְּךָ֖ <WH7503> with thee he will not fail וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or יַעַזְבֶֽךָּ׃ <WH5800> thee nor forsake פ

וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses לִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> and said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> to him לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> unto him in the sight כָל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of all Israel חֲזַ֣ק <WH2388> Be strong וֶאֱמָץ֒ <WH553> and of a good courage כִּ֣י <WH3588> for אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you תָּבוֹא֙ <WH935> for thou must go אֶת־ <WH854> for הָעָ֣ם <WH5971> with this people הַזֶּ֔ה <WH2088> this אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֕רֶץ <WH776> unto the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֧ע <WH7650> hath sworn יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD לַאֲבֹתָ֖ם <WH1> unto their fathers לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> to give לָהֶ֑ם וְאַתָּ֖ה <WH859> and you תַּנְחִילֶ֥נָּה <WH5157> them and thou shalt cause them to inherit אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַֽיהוָ֞ה <WH3068> And the LORD ה֣וּא ׀ <WH1931> who הַהֹלֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> he [it is] that doth go לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> before ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יִהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become עִמָּ֔ךְ <WH5973> with לֹ֥א <WH3808> He will not יַרְפְּךָ֖ <WH7503> thee he will be with thee he will not fail וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> or יַֽעַזְבֶ֑ךָּ <WH5800> thee neither forsake לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִירָ֖א <WH3372> thee fear וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֵחָֽת׃ <WH2865> not neither be dismayed

וַיִּכְתֹּ֣ב <WH3789> wrote מֹשֶׁה֮ <WH4872> And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֣ה <WH8451> this law הַזֹּאת֒ <WH2063> likewise וַֽיִּתְּנָ֗הּ <WH5414> and delivered אֶל־ <WH413> to הַכֹּהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> it unto the priests בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> of Levi הַנֹּ֣שְׂאִ֔ים <WH5375> which bare אֶת־ <WH853> אֲר֖וֹן <WH727> the ark בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> of the covenant יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to כָּל־ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֖י <WH2205> and unto all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיְצַ֥ו <WH6680> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses אוֹתָ֣ם <WH853> לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> them saying מִקֵּ֣ץ ׀ <WH7093> At the end שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> of [every] seven שָׁנִ֗ים <WH8141> years בְּמֹעֵ֛ד <WH4150> in the solemnity שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> of the year הַשְּׁמִטָּ֖ה <WH8059> of release בְּחַ֥ג <WH2282> in the feast הַסֻּכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5521> of tabernacles

בְּב֣וֹא <WH935> is come כָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> When all Israel לֵרָאוֹת֙ <WH7200> to appear אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which יִבְחָ֑ר <WH977> which he shall choose תִּקְרָ֞א <WH7121> thou shalt read אֶת־ <WH853> הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> this law הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> in נֶ֥גֶד <WH5048> front כָּל־ <WH3605> of all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> before all Israel בְּאָזְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH241> in their hearing

הַקְהֵ֣ל <WH6950> together אֶת־ <WH853> הָעָ֗ם <WH5971> the people הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֤ים <WH376> the men וְהַנָּשִׁים֙ <WH802> and women וְהַטַּ֔ף <WH2945> and children וְגֵרְךָ֖ <WH1616> and thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֑יךָ <WH8179> that [is] within thy gates לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so יִשְׁמְע֜וּ <WH8085> that they may hear וּלְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so יִלְמְד֗וּ <WH3925> and that they may learn וְיָֽרְאוּ֙ <WH3372> and fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹֽהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God וְשָׁמְר֣וּ <WH8104> and observe לַעֲשׂ֔וֹת <WH6213> to do אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all דִּבְרֵ֖י <WH1697> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <WH8451> of this law הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> likewise

וּבְנֵיהֶ֞ם <WH1121> And [that] their children אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not יָדְע֗וּ <WH3045> which have not known יִשְׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> [any thing] may hear וְלָ֣מְד֔וּ <WH3925> and learn לְיִרְאָ֖ה <WH3372> to fear אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <WH430> your God כָּל־ <WH3605> long הַיָּמִ֗ים <WH3117> as long as אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> you חַיִּים֙ <WH2416> ye live עַל־ <WH5921> on הָ֣אֲדָמָ֔ה <WH127> in the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> you עֹבְרִ֧ים <WH5674> whither ye go over אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּרְדֵּ֛ן <WH3383> Jordan שָׁ֖מָּה <WH8033> in it לְרִשְׁתָּֽהּ׃ <WH3423> to possess פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold קָרְב֣וּ <WH7126> approach יָמֶיךָ֮ <WH3117> Behold thy days לָמוּת֒ <WH4191> that thou must die קְרָ֣א <WH7121> call אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <WH3091> Joshua וְהִֽתְיַצְּב֛וּ <WH3320> and present בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> yourselves in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וַאֲצַוֶּ֑נּוּ <WH6680> that I may give him a charge וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> And Moses וִֽיהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> and Joshua וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֖וּ <WH3320> and presented בְּאֹ֥הֶל <WH168> themselves in the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> of the congregation

וַיֵּרָ֧א <WH7200> appeared יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> And the LORD בָּאֹ֖הֶל <WH168> in the tabernacle בְּעַמּ֣וּד <WH5982> in a pillar עָנָ֑ן <WH6051> of a cloud וַיַּעֲמֹ֛ד <WH5975> stood עַמּ֥וּד <WH5982> and the pillar הֶעָנָ֖ן <WH6051> of the cloud עַל־ <WH5921> at פֶּ֥תַח <WH6607> over the door הָאֹֽהֶל׃ <WH168> of the tabernacle ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> unto Moses הִנְּךָ֥ <WH2009> Behold שֹׁכֵ֖ב <WH7901> Behold thou shalt sleep עִם־ <WH5973> with אֲבֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH1> with thy fathers וְקָם֩ <WH6965> will rise up הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> and this people הַזֶּ֜ה <WH2088> and this וְזָנָ֣ה ׀ <WH2181> and go a whoring אַחֲרֵ֣י ׀ <WH310> after אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the gods נֵֽכַר־ <WH5236> of the strangers הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> of which ה֤וּא <WH1931> they בָא־ <WH935> whither they go שָׁ֙מָּה֙ <WH8033> into בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <WH7130> [to be] among וַעֲזָבַ֕נִי <WH5800> them and will forsake וְהֵפֵר֙ <WH6565> me and break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֖תִּי <WH3772> which I have made אִתּֽוֹ׃ <WH854> for

וְחָרָ֣ה <WH2734> shall be kindled אַפִּ֣י <WH639> Then my anger ב֣וֹ בַיּוֹם־ <WH3117> against them in that day הַ֠הוּא <WH1931> and I וַעֲזַבְתִּ֞ים <WH5800> and I will forsake וְהִסְתַּרְתִּ֨י <WH5641> them and I will hide פָנַ֤י <WH6440> my face מֵהֶם֙ <WH1992> like וְהָיָ֣ה <WH1961> become לֶֽאֱכֹ֔ל <WH398> from them and they shall be devoured וּמְצָאֻ֛הוּ <WH4672> shall befall רָע֥וֹת <WH7451> evils רַבּ֖וֹת <WH7227> and many וְצָר֑וֹת <WH6869> and troubles וְאָמַר֙ <WH559> them so that they will say בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he הֲלֹ֗א <WH3808> not עַ֣ל <WH5921> and כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֵ֤ין <WH369> else אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> upon us because our God בְּקִרְבִּ֔י <WH7130> [is] not among מְצָא֖וּנִי <WH4672> come הָרָע֥וֹת <WH7451> Are not these evils הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> these

וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I הַסְתֵּ֨ר <WH5640> closed up אַסְתִּ֤יר <WH5641> And I will surely פָּנַי֙ <WH6440> my face בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> in that day הַה֔וּא <WH1931> he עַ֥ל <WH5921> because כָּל־ <WH3605> of all הָרָעָ֖ה <WH7451> for all the evils אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which they shall have wrought כִּ֣י <WH3588> in that פָנָ֔ה <WH6437> they are turned אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> unto other

וְעַתָּ֗ה <WH6258> Now כִּתְב֤וּ <WH3789> Now therefore write לָכֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <WH7892> ye this song הַזֹּ֔את <WH2063> yourselves וְלַמְּדָ֥הּ <WH3925> for you and teach אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> it the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel שִׂימָ֣הּ <WH7760> put בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> it in their mouths לְמַ֨עַן <WH4616> so תִּהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לִּ֜י הַשִּׁירָ֥ה <WH7892> that this song הַזֹּ֛את <WH2063> may be a לְעֵ֖ד <WH5707> may be a witness בִּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> for me against the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אֲבִיאֶ֜נּוּ <WH935> For when I shall have brought אֶֽל־ <WH413> into הָאֲדָמָ֣ה ׀ <WH127> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִשְׁבַּ֣עְתִּי <WH7650> which I sware לַאֲבֹתָ֗יו <WH1> unto their fathers זָבַ֤ת <WH2100> that floweth חָלָב֙ <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey וְאָכַ֥ל <WH398> and they shall have eaten וְשָׂבַ֖ע <WH7646> and filled וְדָשֵׁ֑ן <WH1878> themselves and waxen fat וּפָנָ֞ה <WH6437> then will they turn אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱלֹהִ֤ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִים֙ <WH312> unto other וַעֲבָד֔וּם <WH5647> and serve וְנִ֣אֲצ֔וּנִי <WH5006> them and provoke וְהֵפֵ֖ר <WH6565> me and break אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> my covenant

וְ֠הָיָה <WH1961> shall come כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when תִמְצֶ֨אןָ <WH4672> are befallen אֹת֜וֹ <WH853> רָע֣וֹת <WH7451> evils רַבּוֹת֮ <WH7227> And it shall come to pass when many וְצָרוֹת֒ <WH6869> and troubles וְ֠עָנְתָה <WH6030> shall testify הַשִּׁירָ֨ה <WH7892> them that this song הַזֹּ֤את <WH2063> likewise לְפָנָיו֙ <WH6440> against לְעֵ֔ד <WH5707> them as a witness כִּ֛י <WH3588> when לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תִשָּׁכַ֖ח <WH7911> for it shall not be forgotten מִפִּ֣י <WH6310> out of the mouths זַרְע֑וֹ <WH2233> of their seed כִּ֧י <WH3588> when יָדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> for I know אֶת־ <WH853> יִצְר֗וֹ <WH3336> their imagination אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which ה֤וּא <WH1931> they עֹשֶׂה֙ <WH6213> which they go about הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> even now בְּטֶ֣רֶם <WH2962> before אֲבִיאֶ֔נּוּ <WH935> before I have brought אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> them into the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִשְׁבָּֽעְתִּי׃ <WH7650> which I sware
